title: PraXio™ – Your Operational Governance Command Center
subtitle: Real-time dashboards, automated reporting, AI anomaly detection—all in one unified platform
whatIsDescription: PraXio™ is a unified governance and operations platform built exclusively for TwelfthKey Consulting clients. Unlike fragmented tools (Excel, Slack, email), PraXio™ centralizes all operational data, governance metrics, and team collaboration in one transparent, easy-to-navigate interface.

aiAnomalyDetection.title: AI Anomaly Detection
aiAnomalyDetection.description: Alerts when metrics deviate from norm

roleBasedAccess.title: Role-based Access
roleBasedAccess.description: CEO, CBO, team leads, individual contributors see what they need

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Connects to HRMS, CRM, ERP, finance systems

readyDescription: See how PraXio™ can transform your operations
